This app demonstrates:

1. All possible parameters of `busy_indicators.options`
2. A minimal UI with just one button to trigger a long computation
3. Uses express mode syntax
4. No external files or data dependencies
5. Shows all three types of busy indicators:
   - Spinner during computation
   - Fade effect on recalculating elements
   - Pulse banner at the top of the page

The app includes:
- A custom spinner configuration (bars3 type)
- Custom colors and sizes
- Animation timing controls
- Opacity settings
- Pulse effect settings

When you click the "Start Long Computation" button, it triggers a 5-second delay that will show all the busy indicators in action.

To run the app, save it as `app.py` and run it with:
```bash
shiny run app.py
```

Required package dependencies:
```
shiny
```

The app will demonstrate the busy indicators with:
1. A spinner that appears after 1 second delay
2. A fade effect on the output area
3. A pulsing banner at the top of the page
4. All with custom colors, sizes and animation speeds
